title: AdarittaruL murugA
sahitya:
AdarttaruL murugA pEdai enai eppOdum


anupallavi

  shOdanaiyAl cintai sOrum pOdellAm vEdanaiyAl manam vendiDAdu irundiDa


caraNam    undan tiruvaDiyE endan pughaliDam ena santatam ninaindu vandunaip-paNivEn
sendil shirandiDum kandanE undan cintai kanindu inda siriyOnaip-parivODu
